turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. A persistent cough and fatigue can be caused by various factors. Possible causes include a lingering cold or flu, bronchitis, allergies, or even acid reflux. Less commonly, it could indicate something more serious. Also, are you a smoker, or do you have any known allergies or pre-existing conditions?

turns.speaker: agent
